name: Gacha Guy
description:
Gacha Guy is a auto-battler and top-down-shooter roguelike where you fight robots for cash and gamble it all way for the chance of getting a png of a cartoon character. The goal of this project is to realistically simulate what it's like to be addicted to mobile gacha games while unrealistically simulating what would happen if a bunch of evil robots invaded an abandoned factory.

-Fight against an onslaught of mechanical warriors with fast-paced combat!

-Gamble (in-game) money to unlock 6 different characters to fight in a auto-battler! Each has a unique effect that'll assist you while fighting robots!

-Play with a progressive difficulty system! The more money you spend, the harder the game gets!

-Fight a big robot at the end!

Created by students of UW Stout for the Stout Game Expo:

Zoom Coe - Original Pitch, Player and Misc. Coder

Blane Suess - Gacha and Misc. Coder

Jacob Richardt - Enemy Coder

Creed Zetzman - Pick Up and Gacha Character Artist

Samuel Lambert - Enemy and Player Artist

AJ Heyen - Environment, UI, and Effects Artist
